page.title: 12Sidmouth Regatta.
page.content: { Sidmouth Regatta}is held during July, lasting for five days. A number of events take place, for example{competitions for dancing, {drawing, painting, singing, races, {fairs, etc.}The most favoured day is the last Saturday when everyone turns up dressed in fancy dress costumes. Prior to the Regatta, teams are formed to build their own{rafts.}When the race starts, everyone present is encouraged to join in the fun by supporting their favourites. In the early evening the great{Conga {dance competition}is held in an attempt to break the record for the most people taking part. Then come the fantastic{Red Arrows,}everyone crowding onto the seafront to watch the spectacular and breathtaking performance they give with loops, arrowheads, dives and coloured smoke.
